place.original: Wilton St George, Wilton, Somerset, England

documents.text:
Samuel Ham of the parish of Honiton and Elizabeth Spiller
were married this 3rd day of November 1828 by David Smith
Stone, Pl Curate,
In the Presence of
Jno Pain.
R.G. Halls.  Peggy Hammet.
No. 86.
